text: Michel Aurillac (11 July 1928 - 6 July 2017) was a French lawyer, politician and author. He served as a member of the National Assembly for Indre from 1978 to 1981, and in 1986. He was the Minister of Cooperation from 1986 to 1988. He won the 1987 Prix Narcisse Michaut from the Académie française. Aurillac died on 6 July 2017 in Indre, France at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French lawyers Category:Politicians from Centre-Val de Loire Category:Writers from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:Writers from Centre-Val de Loire Category:Politicians from Marseille Category:People from Indre
title: Michel Aurillac
